setprefix.help:
Sets the server's cus0tom prefix (the original will still work). Requires the Manage Server permission. To use spaces in your prefix quote it.
You can even use a space at the end of the prefix.

Example 1 (no spaces):
[p]setprefix splat!
Example 2 (with trailing space):
[p]setprefix "splat "

To remove your server's prefix:
[p]setprefix ""
setprefix.long: In order to prevent abuse to my disk, the custom prefix length has been capped at 10. Sorry!
setprefix.formatted: Your server's custom prefix has been {}.
